title: Dragon Race Player
description:
Description :
        Dragon Race PlayerIn order not to let the world's first quantum game, which he worked so hard to develop fall into the hands of bloodthirsty investors, Li Menglong, a young genius of quantum computer, fled and killed after locking the game, and unexpectedly crossed into the game world he built. Since then, Li Menglong has been fighting using wits and courage to prevent investors from cracking the game and taking control of the game, while constantly improving the final part of the unfinished game. The wonderful journey made him feel the lack of emotion and
